Entries.Name: [[Roads|Dirt Road]]
Entries.Description: Connects buildings and allows for transportation of goods.

Entries.Description: A place that provides your inhabitants with all the necessities of daily life.

Entries.Description: Your residents live here. Residents provide income and workforce.

Entries.Description: Accepts and distributes goods from, and to your production buildings.
